full_summary:
### SUPPLYING MULTICHANNEL LIQUID HANDLER SYSTEM
### DEADLINE EXTENTION
**AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME**
Please disregard Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by **August 3, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)**. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### CONTRACT REQUIREMENT
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) seeks the supply of a **robotic multichannel liquid handler system** for serum sample handling. The system is required to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, within **two months of Contract Award Date**. All contracted terms, including robotic control software, installation, on-site training, warranty, maintenance, and support services will be included in the contract.

### CONTRACT PERIOD
The period of the Contract is **from the date of Contract award to one year after delivery and acceptance of the work**. During this time, the bidder will be required to provide the necessary warranties, maintenance, and support services.

### BID REQUISITE
Bidders must meet the **mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal (RFP)**. The successful bidder will be required to provide evidence of their ability to meet these requirements.

### DEBRIEFING PROCESS
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the RFP process. Bidders should make this request to the Contracting Authority within **15 working days of receipt of the results of the RFP process**.

### CONTRACT INFORMATION
* **Contract Reference Number:** WS4580370996
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4580370996
* **Publication Date:** June 27, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 3, 2024, at 14:00 EDT
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity Name:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* **Contact Information:** Vanessa Burns, [vanessa.burns@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vanessa.burns@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Latest notice information:** 
 https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20152083?extsite=MjAxNTIwODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk
